alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 9:53PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 951 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Two Buttes Reservoir, or 10 miles north of Springfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. The hail was accumulating to over one half inch deep and was covering the ground and roadways. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Two Buttes around 1010 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
